content: Research note: Urban athletes aged 30-45 with MEDICAL_CONDITION bilateral meniscal injuries showed 28% faster functional recovery when combining arthroscopic surgery with accelerated rehab protocols versus standard care. STUDY_ID ORTHO-RECOV-23 tracked 142 PROCEDURE meniscal repair cases at 4 centers from EVENT_DATE 2023-05-15 to EVENT_DATE 2023-10-30.
